insert into totality_ticket (school_name, shool_code, room_number, seat_number, student_name, class_name, exam_number, classroom, `time`, quantum, `rule`) values (#{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shoolCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seatNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classroom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=DATE}, #{quantum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rule,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update totality_ticket set school_name = #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shool_code = #{shoolCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_number = #{roomNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, seat_number = #{seatNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, student_name = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_name = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exam_number = #{examNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classroom = #{classroom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `time` = #{time,jdbcType=DATE}, quantum = #{quantum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `rule` = #{rule,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, school_name, shool_code, room_number, seat_number, student_name, class_name, exam_number, classroom, `time`, quantum, `rule` from totality_ticket where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
